name: Distractible Gallery VR
description:
Proposals Final Assignment AR or VR Sculpture Exhibition

I choose VR as my final assignment. I am planning to make a gallery kind of environment I will find and place all the models that I can find made by me from 3D Modeling & Animation 1 to 3D Modeling & Animation 3. I will place them like a gallery I will try to make a Full VR (HTC Vive) HMD with Controllers.

  I choose to make a Full VR (HTC Vive) HMD with Controllers because I haven’t made any VR game before so I want to try to create a scene for VR. The scene will look like a gallery space with 3D models that I can find that were made by myself. The only problem is that I don't have a VR headset. I hope it will work if the VR headset is on. 

I will use the XR Interaction Toolkit 0.10.0( not anymore) to create the project. And I will load my models into the scene and place it in the room-scale area. Some of the models will be animated and some will not. I will color most of them.
